entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 04:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
